Document: # Marine Law Command and MP are required to both enforce the law and abide by it. Should MPs disagree on cases, Marine Law rank structure must be followed. - Provost > Commanding Officer > CMP > Warden > MP - [textlink="ODefinitions" link="CMMarineLawDefinitions"] - [textlink="XImmunities" link=""] - [textlink="OProcedures" link="CMMarineLawProcedures"] - [textlink="XCrimes" link=""] - [textlink="XPrisoner Rights" link=""] - [textlink="XSpecial Circumstances" link=""] - [textlink="XSynthetics" link=""] - [textlink="XCommanding Officer Provisions" link=""]
